name: The Plant
description:
Somewhere, at some time, elves live peacefully alongside humans for many, many ages. 
Ever full of grace, as well as being mindful, the elves create beauty in all they do: buildings, tools, clothing, dances, stories, and much more. They live in peace with nature, always in tune with the cycles of seasons. They taught the humans what they could to share the beauty and the power of meaning behind words and symbols when sung or drawn. Some today might call this magic...

While they lived for eons, their time was tied to that of their Life Tree, a great tree that marks the passage of time in the forest. There finally came a time when they saw that the Tree showed signs that it was time for the elves to go on and plant the Life Tree's only seed in a new land. 
 
Before they left, they gifted humans many things, and one of them was The Fire Plant, a plant with flowers like flames and roots like gold nuggets. They taught the women how to plant and nurture it, for it can help them care for their families. This plant when harvested and cooked will give heat and health. Heating the root also releases a very warm and fragrant scent that feels like a mother's warm loving hug. 

Since then every woman learned to plant this in their garden...
